sourcesContent:
{{employee.employeeId}}

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { ProjectsService } from '../../Services/projects.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-all-assigned-employee', templateUrl: './all-assigned-employee.component.html', styleUrls: ['./all-assigned-employee.component.css'] }) export class AllAssignedEmployeeComponent { constructor(private service:ProjectsService){} status:string="yes"; employees:any[]=[]; ngOnInit(): void { this.service.getAllAssignedEmployees(this.status).subscribe((res)=>{ this.employees = res; console.log(this.employees); const employees =this.employees.map(u=>u.employeeId) console.log(employees); }) } }
